meanings.definition: A line connecting points on the Earth's surface that have the same average temperature.
meanings.sent1: The isocheim shows areas with similar temperatures on the map.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use isocheims to study climate patterns.
meanings.sent3: The isocheim decided to take a break from connecting points and went on a vacation.
meanings.sent4: The isocheim acted like a thread stitching together regions of similar temperature.
meanings.sent5: Imagine the isocheim as a colorful ribbon wrapping around the globe.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to or characteristic of a region with uniform climate.
meanings.sent1: Living in an isocheim area means experiencing consistent weather throughout the year.
meanings.sent2: The isocheim climate makes it easier to plan outdoor activities.
meanings.sent3: The isocheim weather made everyone in the town wear the same clothes every day.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as steady and comforting as an isocheim climate.
meanings.sent5: The isocheim landscape painted a picture of harmony and balance.
